p: A case of post-infection acute disseminated encephalomyelitis was reported in a child by de Miranda de Sousa et al. in 2006 [22]. The patient was an 11-year old girl born in Porto Velho (Rondônia, Brazil), who presented with anti-dengue IgM antibodies in the serum and CSF, indicating that neuromyelitis optica may be caused by DENV.
